title: Lady Baden Powell in Victoria, 1967
brief_description: Lady Baden Powell was the guest of Sir Rohan and Lady Delacombe on this her 5th visit to Australia. Shows enthusiastic receptions at Britannia Park Guide Training Centre, a social at the Exhibition Buildings, a luncheon at Rotary Headquarters, and Festival of Friendship at Festival Hall. Functions were attended by Scouts, Rangers, Guides and Brownies from all over the State. Photography by Betty Reynolds.
